main.name: Shine Abraham
main.description: I build things for the web
main.bio: I’m an engineer trying to solve real world problems using technology. I've worked as a team of one, where I did everything from start to finish as well as on large teams with a specific role. I pride myself in being flexible and keeping an open mind for each project’s best solution.
main.contactmessage: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

resume.skillmessage: Over the years, I have been very experimental and took up projects which demand vivid variety of skills.

education.description: Participated and won in multiple All Kerala Hackathons. Later got into a Real Time Location Services based startup Agreefy
education.description1: Hosted inter college Counter-Strike: GO tournament, Played Center Forward in multiple football tournaments in college
education.description2: Co-founded a service based startup IOdevs and worked with multiple clients to develop websites and android apps in flutter

education.degree: My most valuable school experiences weren't academic.
education.description: Head boy of the school, Led and Managed a council of 28 members in organising various school events
education.description1: School Football team captain for CBSE Oman Clusters 2013-2015

work.title: Research and Development engineer
work.description: Built the product Flux from scratch and scaled it from early MVP to production grade. Flux is one among the four products of the company which uses surveillance cameras to track people at venues and identify their movement pattern. It helps to show insights about the people visiting the venue. Built using Python and AWS. It identifies humans from images/stream received from the surveillance cameras.
work.description1: Built and integrated people counting cameras to identify flow of people in crowded venues like malls, exhibition centers, office spaces. The dashboard view gives insight of the flow of people and live people count in and out of the venue.
work.description2: Simulated, deployed and integrated Real time location system to track people in venues with nearly 15cm accuracy.
work.description3: Built core functionality of tracking vehicles using GPS devices to track vehicles in a fleet and see them live in our dashboard. Integrated GPS tracking, speed and fuel efficiency monitoring, and other basic alerts to manage fleet of vehicles.
work.description4: Built and integrated a chatbot to AGREEQ ( Agreefy Queue management system ) so as to enable an easy conversational booking system in websites or mobile apps. Developed the chatbot using opensource chatbot.
work.description5: Handled integrations of our product TRACKX with SAP and Oracle EBS enabling easy integrations for clients using SAP or EBS for employee/asset management.
work.description6: Helped in building the software architecture for a new product 'Vision' based on digital signage. Also helped building the product in the initial phase, drew wireframes and UI for the product. Took presentations on the increasing demand of digital signage and proposed a business model for the product.

work.title: Co-founder and technical team lead
work.description1: Built a mobile rescue app along with my colleagues at I/O Developers called 'Kerala Rescue' and helped rescue 50+ stranded people from their flooded homes in 2018 Kerala floods
work.description: Worked in a team to Build school management mobile app and dashboard for a client based in GCC.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Got a global exposure of the work culture in the GCC. Helped in a lot of realisations in the field of business management. Took presentations and actively communicated with diverse clients as part of relationship building and networking.

projects.title: Agreefy Flux
projects.category: Agreefy Flux is a multi-technology platform which analyzes activity on your site, making crowd management and indoor wayfinding simple.

projects.title: Gesture controlled gaming
projects.category: Operate a game through gestures and movement using OpenCV

projects.title: wrld3d javascript
projects.category: A dynamic 3D mapping platform for smart cities and buildings, gaming, AR/VR experiences.
